title: Large coworking space with panoramic views, outlets and USB ports
posting_body: ['Six Weeks Free on All Apartment Floor Plans and Renovation Styles - Tour & Apply This Week!', '$250 Waived Sky Lounge Fee, too :)', "Welcome to The Elements at Sloan's Lake", 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 30', 'OR Text', '30', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 550 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Living well at The elements extends to the great outdoors.', 'Breathe in the natural beauty of majestic mountaintops and the sprawling lake just outside your front door.', 'For those seeking an active, adventurous lifestyle, enjoy kayaking, hiking, and boating on the lake, or venture out for some whitewater rafting, expert rock climbing, and horseback riding.', 'And, within minutes you can enjoy popular boutiques, restaurants, and entertainment venues in downtown Denver.', 'Features:', 'There are three options for renovation styles.', 'The "Retro" Style maintains all the elements we loved from the mid-century era, updated with stylish, contemporary finishes and all with stunning views.', 'The "Premium" apartments on the 11th floors are completed renovated residences with upgraded kitchens, spa bathroom features, and unparalleled views.', 'The "Penthouse" Style on Floors 13th & 14th are the most luxurious residences featuring open concept space plans, deluxe kitchens, spa bath design, surrounded by picturesque mountain and cityscape views.,', "The elements at Sloan's lake is undergoing a transformation.", 'Apartments on the 8th through 14th Floors - all with stunning views of the mountains and the city - will be fully renovated and feature a number of amenities.', '*Built in USB ports (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Quartz Countertops and Tile Backsplash (Premium)', '*Smark Lock Entry (All)', '*Upgraded Bathroom Renovation with Ceramic Tile Shower (All)', '*Spa Style Bath with Floating Vanity (Premium + Penthouse)', '*LED Lighting (All)', '*Luxury carpeting (Premium)', '*Stainless steel appliances (All)', '*Vinyl Wood Plank Flooring (All)', '*Pendant lighting in kitchen (Premium)', '*Custom Modern Countertops (Retro)', '*Custom maple finish kitchen cabinets (Premium)', '*Large Kitchen Island and Dining Bar (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Smart Lock Entry (All)', '*Nostalgic 50s style kitchen steel cabinets (Retro + Penthouse)', 'Community Amenities:', 'Community kitchenette with coffee service and refrigerator, Modern mail center and parcel storage with automatic notification system, Outdoor space for programmed fitness, yoga and stretching overlooking the Rockies, Bike, ski and snowboard storage onsite with repair tools (coming Fall 2020), 1-bedroom hospitality suite rental available for friends and family, Secure key fob entry to the building and residences, Private meeting space with audio-visual connectivity, Large coworking space with panoramic views, outlets and USB ports, Onsite Pet Grooming Station (coming Fall 2020), Beautifully Appointed Penthouse Lounge, Outdoor grilling and dining area with sweeping views of the mountains, Top of the line fitness center featuring a Peloton bike, Spacious outdoor lounge and fire pit with a view of the Denver city skyline', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow TWO pets per apartment home!', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Income Requirements:', 'Minium of 2.5x the monthly rent', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', '8gIhwoEK0']
